intro: Neoussuria, commonly known as the common neoussuria, is a genus of flowering plants belonging to the family Apiaceae. It is characterized by its slender, erect stems and compound leaves with a pinnate arrangement. The flowers are small and clustered in umbels, typical of the Apiaceae family. Neoussuria species are often found in moist, temperate regions and are known for their aromatic foliage. These plants are sometimes used in traditional medicine for their purported health benefits.
